caption.p: Analysis of infection-induced cell death and immune responses. A549-Dualâ„¢ were infected with BR15 E-MUT and MR766 E-MUT and parental clones at MOI of 1. In ( a) and ( b), LDH activity was measured at 48 and 72 hpi respectively. Values represents mean and standard errors of two independent experiments in triplicates. In ( c) and ( d), analysis of IRF pathway activation in response to viral infection. Activity of secreted Lucia luciferase was measured using QUANTI-Luc substrate at 48 and 72 hpi. Results are expressed as raw data of luminescence arbitrary units. Error bars represent standard errors of two independent experiments in triplicates. ns: not significant.
